website_summaries.verdict: Most players who are looking for a complete set for the game will find the JOOLA, a trusted brand in table tennis, to be both affordable and practical for their needs.
pros: Packed with accessories needed for the game, this is a family-friendly JOOLA set that comes with 4 paddles, 10 balls, and a handy carrying case with compartments to keep everything organized
cons: The build of the rackets feels less durable than some competitors, making them more suited to beginners and hobbyists than serious players

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So finally using the paddles and they became unglued at the handles. Also since kids were using them they hit the table with the paddle and it broke the handle. Poor quality expected more from the brand Joola.
customer_reviews.author: Hokiehuang

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for your money
customer_reviews.text: It’s not pro grade for sure, at least not the racket. But it’s right on the money. The balls are great quality and no complains there. The holder is a bit tight to hold rackets. One of the racket has a glue quality control issue. Other than that, no complains.
customer_reviews.author: Will Yang

customer_reviews.title: I am giving this product 3 stars only because the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 3 stars only because the rubber in a couple of the paddles started to separate from the wood. I am going to try an adhesive to glue the rubber to the wood to keep using these paddles. I have no idea why the rubber is separating from the wood. We take care of the paddles and do not abuse them when we play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s on Mr. Ping Pong
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Not crazy about the silly straps on the back, but otherwise awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Perilla

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons really like this. It was purchased as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons really like this. It was purchased as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Paddles and balls are fine. The paddles don’t fit into the pouches very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik E. Sivonen

customer_reviews.title: One handle has come unglued after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag to store things, paddles were generally OK, but one of the handles came unglued after just a few months (fixable with some wood glue and clamp).
customer_reviews.author: David Childers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. The plastic is completely coming off the paddle. You would think with the brand Joola you would receive quality paddles. That’s not the case. Very dissapoiting, used them less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Llorente

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting out the set
customer_reviews.text: The set is perfect for starting and quality paddles for begniners. We have had them now for a few months and seen no wear and tear. I think the more skilled players find them just a little too soft and not perfect but it works. Once again great set for starting and you will need to order more balls.....
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Since 2002

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemical smell aside, once it dissipated we could play for hours of fun with clear heads. Great quality and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Great table super easy to set up kids love it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table super easy to set up kids love it set up by the pool hope it lasts ill post again at end of the season. Summers starts in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bagdon

customer_reviews.title: Great set to keep in hand.
customer_reviews.text: We use this weekly and live the fact that it comes with the "holder" to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: James Mowrey

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our family is enjoying our new table tennis paddles. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JAKE

customer_reviews.title: A very good set for families and begginers
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for new ping pong players, and families with children. It is a starter to medium set. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: school play

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plastic padding separating from paddle edges after only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kollen

customer_reviews.title: Get your paddles
customer_reviews.text: Buy a better net right off the bat, and you need paddles. Quality table and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harrod

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: The rackets barely bounce a ball back. Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: amirmoraj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Glad we got this to store the paddles
customer_reviews.author: Eryn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! I just bought the Ping-Pong table and this family set works great for the whole family. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles and balls - my kids are rough on stuff and thses products are holding up - yeah!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ferber

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The plastic on the racket ripped and broke off after a week's use
customer_reviews.author: MaryJ

product_meta.title: JOOLA Family Premium Table Tennis Bundle Set - 4 Regulation Ping Pong Paddles, 10 Training 40mm Ping Pong Balls, and Carrying Case - For Training and Recreational Play - Indoor and Outdoor Compatible
product_meta.description:
The JOOLA Family Table Tennis Set is an all-in-one kit with everything you need to get your table tennis game started! The set comes with four JOOLA Spirit Rackets and five white and five orange 40-millimeter, 1-star JOOLA ping pong balls. The JOOLA Spirit ping pong paddles have a smooth rubber surface and straight handle design for maximum ball control and are a great choice for improving your table tennis skills. The JOOLA Family Table Tennis Set comes in a convenient storage case that can attach to your table and hold all of your table tennis materials! This set is great for family, friends or anyone looking to keep their table tennis materials organized and ready to play. 

Start playing like a champion with equipment developed for champions! JOOLA is a proud sponsor of the US National Team.
feature_bullets: JOOLA - AN OLYMPIC TABLE TENNIS BRAND TRUSTED FOR 60+ YEARS: Launched in the 1950s, JOOLA has been the proud sponsor of the biggest tournaments in the world, Including the Olympics, World Championships, and US Open. Equipment designed for all levels.

SUPERIOR QUALITY AND DURABILITY: Manufactured to withstand advanced competition, these high quality ping pong paddles are ideal for serving your first ace or hitting the game winner past your opponent as a professional player or in the family game room.

ITTF REGULATION SIZE: Official regulation 5-ply wood paddle featuring a flared handle for a comfortable grip, pips-in table tennis rubber with high-quality sponge and edge tape for added protection. Table tennis equipment for kids and adults.

UNMATCHED PERFORMANCE: The JOOLA Family Table Tennis Paddle Set has official ratings of Speed - 60, Spin - 75, Control – 90. Ideal for recreational, regulation or competitive play with friends and family.

INCLUDES: 4 Spirit Training Table Tennis Paddles, 5 White 40mm regulation ping pong balls, 5 Orange 40mm regulation ping pong balls, and a convienent portable carrying case. Great gift for someone who already owns a JOOLA ping pong table!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
